text: Kalvakuntla Chandrashekar Rao (born 17 February 1954) is an Indian politician. He is the first Chief Minister of Telangana since 2014. He is the founder and leader of the Bharat Rashtra Samithi. He is known for leading the Telangana movement to that led Telangana becoming an Indian state. Rao was the Union Minister of Labour and Employment from 2004 to 2006. He represents Gajwel constituency in the Legislative Assembly of Telangana.Telangana is born as 29th state, K Chandrasekhar Rao takes oath as first CM â€“ Times of India.
